name: Quick Preparation
text: Early on in your adventuring career, you learned (perhaps the hard way) how to prepare your spells even when put under extreme time constraints.
benefit: When preparing spells, you halve the time necessary to do so.
normal: Preparing all of your spells takes 1 hour.
text_zh: 在你的早期冒险生涯中（或许是以某种艰难的方式）,你学会在极苛刻的时间限制中记忆法术。
benefit_zh: 你只需要必需时间的一半就可以准备完法术。
normal_zh: 需要花费1小时时间来选择和准备法术。
